duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage projects by providing day-to-day leadership to analyze their requirements, developing designs, and implementing in-house legacy solution solutions.
Work with business executives to manage portfolio planning and prioritization.
Monitor and manage project financials, scope, and schedule to ensure project stays on track for assigned projects or portfolio of projects.
Facilitate regular status meetings with project team, sponsors, and all stakeholders.
Conduct the Business Requirements gathering and To-Be state design workshops.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Engineering, Information Technology or Management
